name: Ghost Runner (SquidTim)
description:
Made for the brackeys game jam 2022, I didn't actually burn out this time!

so, congrats! you woke up to find yourself stuck in a haunted house, and now a ghost has come to kill you. but luckily it kinda doesn't want to kill you...yet...it sets a timer for 3 minutes, and if you can't get out in that time it will kill you. escape. now.

this is a puzzle platformer inspired by any sort of puzzle game you can think of I guess. it doesn't fit the theme too well, but it's the best I can think of. If you play the game it won't be very long or very hard bc most of the time was spent tweaking, editing, and learning the code instead of making levels, and even then its still a very buggy mess. this was honestly the best I could do and it isn't my favorite game I've ever made, but it came out pretty nicely though, even though it's pretty broken. I hope you guys enjoy the game

also if you think the music is good go download it on Bandcamp, or don't if you don't have space on your pc(like me) is all good

https://squidtimsgameost.bandcamp.com/releases

thank you to cozmos for helping out and doing the sprite work, looks really cool my dude. 

very cool

Also, go sub to him

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEBA_ADy3fEDoVZJwrnFbrQ

also if you want to sub to me that's cool as well but you prob shouldn't lol

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsplGTEMGVGBl0LMaVC6trg/featured

(and yes, I am aware there's a game called ghost runner, I just made this name up on the fly it's not really official)
